RangeIn.description: Distance from object before it spawns

RangeOut.description: Distance from object before it despawns

EaseTimeEnter.description: transition time at the time of invasion (sec) ※ use only events

EaseTimeLeave.description: transition time at the time of withdrawal (sec) ※ use only events

TargetOffsetRight.description: offset left and right of the target coordinate system

TargetOffsetUp.description: offset the top and bottom of the target coordinate system

TargetOffsetFront.description: before and after the offset of the target coordinate system

IsRotateUpDir.description: in the calculation of the UpDir you can either use the rotation?
